headline: CenterPoint Energy (CNP) is a Top Dividend Stock Right Now: Should You Buy?
summary: Dividends are one of the best benefits to being a shareholder, but finding a great dividend stock is no easy task. Does CenterPoint (CNP) have what it takes? Let's find out.

headline: CenterPoint Energy Declares Regular Common Stock Dividend of $0.2200
summary: CenterPoint Energy, Inc.'s (NYSE: CNP) Board of Directors today declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.2200 per share on the issued and outstanding shares of Common Stock payable on September 11, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on August 21, 2025.
